title: Keyboard sometimes not working when I am playing League, it happened twice already!
body: Does anyone know why this happens and how we can fix it? So, as soon as I start a game of League my keyboard suddenly stops working, now I know it's not my PC system because I can type normally as I would in chat and I could send all-chat etc. Also the only way to make it work is if I bind my abilities with CTRL+Key in order for the game to recognize the commands. UPDATE: It's the third time again...

replies.body:
If something goes wrong with your configuration files for League it can sometimes cause your keybinds to go all wonky or just stop working entirely. Let's try to reset those really quickly to make sure they are getting saved to the server correctly from now on by following these steps.

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
- Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings
